column4: do i have to erase a logical partition to create another one on the hdd? of 3 partitions, primary has WinXP, and i want Ubuntu on a logical. Any tools (no fdisk please)
you only need to delete a partition if you have four primary partitions and want to have more than four partitions
in that case, you would need to delete a primary partition and create a logical partition in its place
try them both out, people have very strong opinions both ways
